name: Animate Color Set
summary: Learn about .CLR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Animate was formerly known as Flash, which was originally developed by Macromedia but then merged with Adobe in 2005. Flash became Animate in 2016.

description: Palette of color swatches that can be loaded into Adobe Animate (previously developed by Macromedia); may include basic colors as well as radial and linear gradients; can be applied to objects within a flash (.FLA) animation.
